humanitarian-foss-projects.title: Humanitarian FOSS projects
humanitarian-foss-projects.intro: HFOSS projects are the humanitarian open source projects that are developed by keeping society needs in mind like in developing countries the issues like poverty, facilities for differently abled people,  poor health care, education, etc are the major concerns. The GNOME Accessibility project develops and fosters compelling free open source accessibility solutions for graphical user interfaces. Through a worldwide community of developers and users, we continue to empower everyone, regardless of physical or mental abilities. GNOME has been translated to many of the world's languages. Humanitarian projects & students is  a good match for the welfare of the society.
humanitarian-foss-projects.addition:
* Language: English
* Audience: FOSS developers
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門
